import sys
def main():
    i = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    #print "yo"
    while i!=0:
        #print i
        #count =1
        i=i-1
        s= sys.stdin.readline().split()
        for x in range(len(s)):
            if(s[x]=="8"):
                s[x]="ate"
            elif(s[x]=="w8"):
                s[x]="wait"
            elif(s[x]=="gr8"):
                s[x]="great"
            elif(s[x]=="4"):
                s[x]="for"
            elif(s[x]=="b4"):
                s[x]="before"
        print ' '.join(s)
                
main()
